author: Hofas
body:
<!--

For Windows PowerShell 5.1 issues, suggestions, or feature requests please use the following link instead:
Windows PowerShell [UserVoice](https://windowsserver.uservoice.com/forums/301869-powershell)

This repository is **ONLY** for PowerShell Core 6 issues.

- Make sure you are able to repro it on the [latest released version](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases)
- Search the existing issues.
- Refer to the [FAQ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/FAQ.md).
- Refer to the [known issues](https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/scripting/whats-new/known-issues-ps6?view=powershell-6).

-->

# Steps to reproduce

```powershell 5.1.17763.1

```

# Expected behavior

`when i use psreadline no mather what version 1.2 or 2.0 i schuld be able to use UTF-8 cahracters'

```

# Actual behavior

`after upgrade PS to ver. 5.1.17763.1 when i use PSreadline module i can't get east europe characters from utf8 charset , after i uninstall-module psreadline i can use polisch characters freely 
after install once again psreadline module, once agan can't get poslish letters...'

```

# Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable --> 5.1.17763.1

```5.1.17763.1

```

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: If this is a PSReadLine issue, please open the issue in the [PSReadLine](https://github.com/lzybkr/PSReadLine) repository itself. 🙂

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as external and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been be closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: PSVersion 5.1.17763.1 UTF8 characters are lost...
